spells.name: Animal Aspect
spells.description: You gain some of the beneficial qualities of an animal.

spells.name: Ant Haul, Communal
spells.description: As ant haul, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

spells.name: Brow Gasher
spells.description: Slashing weapon deals bleed damage to an opponent's head.

spells.name: Effortless Armor
spells.description: Armor you wear no longer slows your speed.

spells.name: Endure Elements, Communal
spells.description: As endure elements, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

spells.name: Forest Friend
spells.description: Plants in a forested area become helpful instead of hindering you and your allies.

spells.name: Locate Weakness
spells.description: You roll damage twice when you roll damage for a critical hit and take the best damage.

spells.name: Reloading Hands
spells.description: Loads a single shot into your weapon every round.

spells.name: Returning Weapon, Communal
spells.description: As returning weapon, but you may divide the duration among weapons touched.

spells.name: Ricochet Shot
spells.description: Imbues a projectile weapon to give its ammunition the ability to ricochet.

spells.name: Wilderness Soldiers
spells.description: Nearby plants aid you in combat.
